women_hairstyles.name: Layered Bob
women_hairstyles.description: Classic bob with subtle layers for movement and texture
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a layered bob haircut ending at chin level with soft, subtle layers throughout for movement. Keep the overall shape of a bob while adding gentle layering for texture and volume.

women_hairstyles.name: Pixie Cut
women_hairstyles.description: Short, cropped hairstyle with textured layers on top
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a pixie cut with very short hair (1-2 inches), keeping sides and back short while leaving slightly more length on top with textured layers for styling.

women_hairstyles.name: Long Layers
women_hairstyles.description: Long hair with cascading layers for volume and movement
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create long layered hair extending past the shoulders with multiple cascading layers starting from the collarbone, adding volume and movement throughout the length.

women_hairstyles.name: Beach Waves
women_hairstyles.description: Relaxed, tousled waves mimicking natural beach hair
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Transform hair into relaxed beach waves with loose, tousled texture. Create natural-looking waves that appear effortlessly windswept and casual.

women_hairstyles.name: Blunt Bob
women_hairstyles.description: Sharp, straight-across bob cut with no layers
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a blunt bob with hair cut straight across at one precise length, typically at chin or jaw level, with no layers or graduation for a sharp, geometric look.

women_hairstyles.name: Shag Cut
women_hairstyles.description: Heavily layered cut with feathered ends and lots of texture
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a shag haircut with heavy layering throughout, choppy feathered ends, and lots of texture. Include face-framing layers and a slightly messy, rock-inspired finish.

women_hairstyles.name: Lob (Long Bob)
women_hairstyles.description: Longer version of the classic bob, ending at the collarbone
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a long bob (lob) that ends at or just below the collarbone with clean lines and minimal layering for a sleek, modern appearance.

women_hairstyles.name: Curtain Bangs
women_hairstyles.description: Center-parted bangs that frame the face like curtains
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Add curtain bangs that part in the center and sweep to either side of the face, creating a soft, face-framing effect while keeping the rest of the hairstyle unchanged.

women_hairstyles.name: Wolf Cut
women_hairstyles.description: Hybrid of shag and mullet with heavy layers and texture
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a wolf cut combining elements of a shag and mullet, with heavy layering, shorter layers on top, and longer pieces at the back, creating a wild, textured appearance.

women_hairstyles.name: Butterfly Haircut
women_hairstyles.description: Face-framing layers that resemble butterfly wings
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a butterfly haircut with dramatic face-framing layers that start around the cheekbones and create a wing-like effect, while keeping length at the back.

women_hairstyles.name: French Bob
women_hairstyles.description: Chin-length bob with soft, wispy bangs
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a French bob with hair ending at chin length, featuring soft, wispy bangs that blend seamlessly into the bob shape for a chic Parisian look.

women_hairstyles.name: Asymmetrical Bob
women_hairstyles.description: Bob cut with one side longer than the other
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create an asymmetrical bob where one side is noticeably longer than the other, creating a modern, edgy geometric shape with clean lines.

women_hairstyles.name: Feathered Hair
women_hairstyles.description: Layered cut with feathered, flipped-out ends
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create feathered hair with layers that flip outward at the ends, creating a feathered effect reminiscent of 1970s styling with volume and movement.

women_hairstyles.name: Buzz Cut
women_hairstyles.description: Very short, uniform length all over the head
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a buzz cut with hair clipped very short and uniform all over the head, typically 1/4 to 1/2 inch in length for a clean, minimal look.

women_hairstyles.name: Undercut Bob
women_hairstyles.description: Bob with shaved or very short underneath section
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create an undercut bob with the top section styled as a bob while the underneath/nape area is shaved or cut very short, creating contrast and edge.

women_hairstyles.name: Textured Crop
women_hairstyles.description: Short, choppy cut with lots of texture and movement
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a textured crop with short, choppy layers throughout, adding texture and movement for a modern, edgy appearance with piece-y definition.

women_hairstyles.name: Side Swept Bangs
women_hairstyles.description: Bangs swept dramatically to one side
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Add side-swept bangs that are cut at an angle and styled to sweep dramatically across the forehead to one side, while keeping the rest of the hairstyle unchanged.

women_hairstyles.name: Graduated Bob
women_hairstyles.description: Bob that's shorter in back and longer in front
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a graduated bob that's shorter at the back and gradually gets longer toward the front, creating an angled, stacked effect with volume at the crown.

women_hairstyles.name: Finger Waves
women_hairstyles.description: Vintage-style sculpted waves close to the head
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create finger waves with hair styled in sculpted S-shaped waves close to the head, reminiscent of 1920s and 1930s vintage glamour styling.

women_hairstyles.name: Micro Bob
women_hairstyles.description: Ultra-short bob that sits above the jawline
women_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a micro bob with hair cut very short, ending well above the jawline near the earlobe, for an ultra-modern, geometric appearance.

men_hairstyles.name: Fade Cut
men_hairstyles.description: Short sides that gradually blend into longer hair on top
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a fade haircut with hair gradually transitioning from very short on the sides and back to longer hair on top, with smooth blending between lengths.

men_hairstyles.name: Undercut
men_hairstyles.description: Disconnected cut with short sides and longer top
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create an undercut with the sides and back cut very short (buzzed) while leaving the top section significantly longer, creating a stark contrast between lengths.

men_hairstyles.name: Pompadour
men_hairstyles.description: Hair swept upward and back with volume at the front
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a pompadour with hair swept upward and back from the forehead, creating significant volume and height at the front while keeping sides shorter.

men_hairstyles.name: Quiff
men_hairstyles.description: Textured hair swept up and back with volume
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a quiff with hair on top styled upward and slightly back, creating volume and texture while keeping the sides shorter for contrast.

men_hairstyles.name: Buzz Cut
men_hairstyles.description: Very short, uniform length all over
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a buzz cut with hair clipped to a uniform short length all over the head, typically 1/8 to 1/2 inch for a clean, military-style appearance.

men_hairstyles.name: Crew Cut
men_hairstyles.description: Short back and sides with slightly longer top
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a crew cut with hair cut short on the back and sides while leaving the top slightly longer, creating a neat, professional military-inspired look.

men_hairstyles.name: Side Part
men_hairstyles.description: Classic style with hair parted and combed to one side
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a side part hairstyle with hair neatly parted on one side and combed over, maintaining medium length for a classic, professional appearance.

men_hairstyles.name: Slick Back
men_hairstyles.description: Hair combed straight back with product for shine
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a slicked-back hairstyle with hair combed straight back from the forehead, appearing smooth and polished as if styled with pomade or gel.

men_hairstyles.name: Textured Crop
men_hairstyles.description: Short, choppy cut with texture and movement
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a textured crop with short, choppy layers on top creating texture and movement, while keeping the sides neat and shorter.

men_hairstyles.name: Caesar Cut
men_hairstyles.description: Short cut with hair combed forward toward the forehead
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a Caesar cut with hair cut short and combed forward toward the forehead, often with a small fringe, for a classic Roman-inspired look.

men_hairstyles.name: Ivy League
men_hairstyles.description: Longer crew cut that can be parted and styled
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create an Ivy League cut, which is a longer version of a crew cut with enough length on top to be parted and styled to the side.

men_hairstyles.name: Flat Top
men_hairstyles.description: Hair cut flat across the top with short sides
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a flat top with hair on top cut to stand upright and flat across the surface, while sides are cut short, creating a geometric, boxy appearance.

men_hairstyles.name: Mohawk
men_hairstyles.description: Strip of longer hair down the center with shaved sides
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a mohawk with a strip of longer hair running down the center of the head while the sides are shaved or cut very short.

men_hairstyles.name: Faux Hawk
men_hairstyles.description: Mohawk-inspired style without fully shaved sides
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a faux hawk with hair styled to mimic a mohawk by creating height in the center while keeping hair on the sides, just styled down or cut shorter.

men_hairstyles.name: Taper Cut
men_hairstyles.description: Gradually shorter hair from top to neckline
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a taper cut with hair gradually getting shorter from the top of the head down to the neckline, creating a smooth, professional transition.

men_hairstyles.name: High and Tight
men_hairstyles.description: Very short sides with slightly longer top
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a high and tight cut with the sides and back cut very short (almost shaved) while leaving a small amount of length on the very top.

men_hairstyles.name: Comb Over
men_hairstyles.description: Hair combed from one side to cover the other
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a comb over with longer hair on one side combed across to the other side, often used to cover thinning areas or create a classic style.

men_hairstyles.name: Mullet
men_hairstyles.description: Short front and sides with long back
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a mullet with hair cut short at the front and sides while leaving the back section significantly longer, creating the classic 'business front, party back' look.

men_hairstyles.name: Bowl Cut
men_hairstyles.description: Hair cut in a straight line around the head
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a bowl cut with hair cut in a straight line around the head at one length, creating a bowl-like shape that's uniform all around.

men_hairstyles.name: Bro Flow
men_hairstyles.description: Medium-length hair swept back naturally
men_hairstyles.ai_instruction: Create a bro flow with medium-length hair (3-5 inches) that's grown out and swept back naturally, creating a relaxed, effortless surfer-style appearance.

men_beards.name: Full Beard
men_beards.description: Complete beard covering cheeks, jaw, and chin
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a full beard that covers the entire lower face including cheeks, jawline, and chin with even, well-groomed hair growth.

men_beards.name: Goatee
men_beards.description: Beard on chin only, often with mustache
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a goatee consisting of hair on the chin area only, typically combined with a mustache, while keeping the cheeks clean-shaven.

men_beards.name: Van Dyke
men_beards.description: Pointed goatee with disconnected mustache
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a Van Dyke beard consisting of a pointed goatee on the chin with a separate, disconnected mustache above the lip.

men_beards.name: Circle Beard
men_beards.description: Goatee connected to mustache in circular shape
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a circle beard where the goatee and mustache are connected, forming a circular pattern around the mouth while keeping cheeks clean.

men_beards.name: Stubble
men_beards.description: Short, rough beard growth (1-3mm)
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add stubble consisting of short, rough facial hair growth (1-3mm) across the jaw, chin, and cheeks for a rugged, casual appearance.

men_beards.name: 5 O'Clock Shadow
men_beards.description: Very light stubble visible by evening
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a 5 o'clock shadow consisting of very light stubble that's barely visible, as if the person shaved in the morning and slight growth appeared by evening.

men_beards.name: Chinstrap
men_beards.description: Thin line of hair along the jawline
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a chinstrap beard consisting of a thin line of hair that follows the jawline from ear to ear, passing under the chin like a strap.

men_beards.name: Soul Patch
men_beards.description: Small patch of hair below the lower lip
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a soul patch consisting of a small, neat patch of hair directly below the center of the lower lip, keeping the rest of the face clean-shaven.

men_beards.name: Mutton Chops
men_beards.description: Large sideburns extending down to jawline
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add mutton chops consisting of large, thick sideburns that extend down to the jawline while keeping the chin and mustache area clean-shaven.

men_beards.name: Handlebar Mustache
men_beards.description: Mustache with curled, waxed ends
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a handlebar mustache with the ends curled upward and outward, typically waxed to maintain the distinctive curved shape, while keeping the rest of the face clean.

men_beards.name: Horseshoe Mustache
men_beards.description: Mustache extending down around the mouth
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a horseshoe mustache that extends from the upper lip down around both sides of the mouth to the jawline, creating an inverted U-shape.

men_beards.name: Anchor Beard
men_beards.description: Pointed beard with mustache resembling an anchor
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add an anchor beard consisting of a pointed beard on the chin connected to a mustache, with the overall shape resembling a ship's anchor.

men_beards.name: Balbo
men_beards.description: Beard without sideburns, with disconnected mustache
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a Balbo beard covering the chin and jaw area without connecting to sideburns, paired with a separate mustache that doesn't connect to the beard.

men_beards.name: Imperial
men_beards.description: Mustache with long, upward-curled ends
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add an Imperial mustache with long ends that curl upward dramatically, often waxed to maintain the distinctive upward spiral shape.

men_beards.name: Pencil Mustache
men_beards.description: Thin, narrow mustache above the upper lip
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a pencil mustache consisting of a thin, narrow line of hair directly above the upper lip, kept very neat and precisely trimmed.

men_beards.name: Friendly Mutton Chops
men_beards.description: Sideburns connected by mustache
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add friendly mutton chops consisting of large sideburns that connect across the upper lip via a mustache, while keeping the chin clean-shaven.

men_beards.name: Ducktail
men_beards.description: Full beard shaped to a point at the chin
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a ducktail beard consisting of a full beard that's shaped and trimmed to come to a point at the chin, resembling a duck's tail.

men_beards.name: Bandholz
men_beards.description: Long, full, natural beard with mustache
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a Bandholz beard consisting of a long, full, natural beard (6+ inches) with a connected mustache, allowed to grow freely with minimal trimming.

men_beards.name: Garibaldi
men_beards.description: Full, rounded beard with integrated mustache
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a Garibaldi beard consisting of a full, wide, rounded beard (4-6 inches) with an integrated mustache, kept neat but with a natural, full appearance.

men_beards.name: Verdi
men_beards.description: Short, rounded full beard with curled mustache
men_beards.ai_instruction: Add a Verdi beard consisting of a short, rounded full beard with a distinctive curled mustache that doesn't connect to the beard portion.

women_colors.name: Platinum Blonde
women_colors.description: Ultra-light, almost white blonde with cool undertones
women_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to platinum blonde - very light, almost white blonde with cool, icy undertones. Maintain the hairstyle while only changing the color.

women_colors.name: Honey Blonde
women_colors.description: Warm, golden blonde with honey-like tones
women_colors.ai_instruction: Change hair color to honey blonde with warm, golden tones resembling natural honey. Add subtle highlights for dimension while keeping the hairstyle unchanged.

women_colors.name: Ash Brown
women_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to ash brown - a cool-toned brown with subtle gray undertones that neutralizes any warmth. Keep the hairstyle identical.

women_colors.name: Chocolate Brown
women_colors.description: Rich, deep brown with warm undertones
women_colors.ai_instruction: Change hair color to chocolate brown - a rich, deep brown with warm undertones resembling dark chocolate. Maintain all other aspects of the appearance.

women_colors.name: Auburn
women_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to auburn - a reddish-brown base with natural copper highlights and warm undertones. Keep the hairstyle and cut unchanged.

women_colors.name: Balayage
women_colors.description: Hand-painted highlights for natural sun-kissed effect
women_colors.ai_instruction: Add balayage highlighting technique with hand-painted blonde highlights that create a natural, sun-kissed effect, focusing on face-framing pieces and ends.

women_colors.name: Ombre
women_colors.description: Gradual color transition from dark roots to light ends
women_colors.ai_instruction: Create an ombre effect with hair color gradually transitioning from darker roots to lighter ends, typically from brown to blonde with smooth blending.

women_colors.name: Copper Red
women_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to copper red - a vibrant, fiery red with orange undertones that catches light beautifully. Maintain the existing hairstyle.

women_colors.name: Caramel Highlights
women_colors.ai_instruction: Add caramel highlights throughout the hair - warm, golden-brown highlights that add dimension and warmth to the base color while keeping the style unchanged.

women_colors.name: Jet Black
women_colors.description: Deep, true black with blue undertones
women_colors.ai_instruction: Change hair color to jet black - a deep, true black with subtle blue undertones for richness and shine. Keep all other features identical.

men_colors.name: Natural Brown
men_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to natural brown - a medium brown shade with neutral undertones that looks completely natural. Maintain the existing hairstyle.

men_colors.name: Dark Brown
men_colors.description: Deep brown with slight warm undertones
men_colors.ai_instruction: Change hair color to dark brown - a deep, rich brown with slight warm undertones for a natural, masculine appearance. Keep the hairstyle unchanged.

men_colors.name: Black
men_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to true black - a deep, solid black color that appears natural and well-maintained. Maintain all other aspects of the appearance.

men_colors.name: Sandy Brown
men_colors.ai_instruction: Change hair color to sandy brown - a light brown with natural blonde undertones, resembling sun-lightened brown hair. Keep the hairstyle identical.

men_colors.name: Ash Blonde
men_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to ash blonde - a cool-toned blonde with gray undertones that neutralizes any brassiness. Maintain the existing cut and style.

men_colors.name: Salt and Pepper
men_colors.description: Natural mix of gray and original color
men_colors.ai_instruction: Add salt and pepper coloring with a natural mix of gray and the original hair color, creating a distinguished, mature appearance while keeping the hairstyle unchanged.

men_colors.name: Silver Gray
men_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to silver gray - a sophisticated gray with metallic silver tones that appears naturally aged and distinguished. Keep the hairstyle identical.

men_colors.name: Dirty Blonde
men_colors.ai_instruction: Change hair color to dirty blonde - a muted blonde with brown undertones that creates a natural, lived-in color. Maintain all other features.

men_colors.name: Chestnut Brown
men_colors.ai_instruction: Transform hair color to chestnut brown - a warm brown with subtle reddish undertones resembling the color of chestnuts. Keep the hairstyle unchanged.

men_colors.name: Charcoal
men_colors.ai_instruction: Change hair color to charcoal - a very dark gray-black color that's almost black but with subtle gray undertones for depth. Maintain the existing hairstyle.
